key.name: auto-rotate
key.description: When enabled, this will cause the daemon to automatically change the wallpaper whenever the current profile is changed.
key.summary: Auto rotate wallpaper when the profile is changed.

key.name: auto-start
key.description: When enabled, the daemon will be automatically started when the applet is loaded. If it is already running or this is disabled, no action will be taken.
key.summary: Automatically start the daemon when the applet loads

key.name: current-profile
key.description: This is the current profile that the daemon will load.

key.name: interval
key.description: When timer is enabled, the interval is the amount of time in seconds between the daemon switching the wallpaper to the next available wallpaper. Default is 10 seconds.
key.summary: Number of seconds between wallpaper changes

key.name: next-wallpaper-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the next wallpaper.

key.name: notifications
key.description: Display a notification each time an event happens with wallpaper changer. This does not stop the applet from reporting errors.

key.name: prev-wallpaper-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the previous wallpaper.

key.name: profiles
key.description: These are all the available profiles. By default it contains a single profile that will recursively load /usr/share/backgrouds

key.name: profile-state
key.description: This is the storage location of the profile's last state. By default, there are no states saved until a new profile is loaded.

key.name: random
key.description: If set to true the daemon will randomize the order in which the wallpapers are displayed
key.summary: Display wallpapers in a random order

key.name: remember-profile-state
key.description: When enabled, the daemon will remember its current and next wallpaper for the current profile when the profile is changed. This means returning back to the profile will restore the previous background plus the next in queue.
key.summary: Remember profile last wallpaper on load

key.name: rotation
key.description: Choose how the rotation is handled by the daemon. The interval choice is the default. It enables a timer that uses the interval value to change the wallpaper every [interval] seconds. For hourly, the wallpaper will be changed at the beginning of every hour of the day. When disabled, rotation is not done by the daemon, but only by user interaction with the applet.
key.summary: Different options to control when the wallpaper is changed
